Package pokerapp.utils.textformat

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Formattable<T>
    Provides a generic interface through which Value Objects can be formatted
    FormattableResolver<T>
    Detailed explanation of the class and its collaborators.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFormattable<T>
    Provides a default, generically-typed implementation of the Formattable interface.
    CompositeFormattable<T>
    Detailed explanation of the class and its collaborators.
    Format<T>
    Represents a named format of a Value Object.
    FormatResolver<T>
    Enables a Value Object to describe the formatting strategy for a particular format.
    Formats<T>
    Contains all of the Format objects for a given Value Type.
    StringFormatter
    Provides a new (better?) approach to formatting strings, inspired by C#'s string.format() method and Python's string interpolation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FormatStringException
    Describes the error in the FormatString.
    IllegalFormatCodeException
    Detailed explanation of the class and its collaborators.
